notesStmt.note: Transcribed from digital images contributed to the Internet Archive by the University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign.

sourceDesc.bibl: Chicago Foreign Language Press Survey, 1936-1941, Works Projects Administration, Chicago Public Library Omnibus Project

revisionDesc.change: Initial TEI transcription from PanGeo Partners, Inc.

body.p: The following Scandinavians bought or sold real estate in Chicago recently:
August E. Gustafson to Samuel Clark: 53rd Avenue and Superior Street. Price, $3,000.
Anna L. Johnson to Jennie M. Armstrong: 507 La Salle ["North" or "South" not specified.] Price, $8,400.
Otto F. Erickson to Edward J. Johnson: German and Southport Avenues. Price, $7,500.
Chicago Title & Trust Company to Oscar A. Johnson: Sacramento and Sunnyside Avenues. Price, $1,000.
Edward J. Walsh to Catherine L. Benson: Western and Lawrence Avenues. Price, $20,000.
Ole J. Olesen to Morris Janosky: Maplewood Avenue and Division Street. Price, $6,000.
Harold W. Dyer to Julius Petersen: Lincoln Avenue and Byron Street. Price, $10.
Christine Bruse to John C. Petersen: Richwood Avenue and Sheriden Road. Price, $10.
Christian L. Benson to G. W. De Smet: Pratt and Newgard Avenues. Price, $3,000.
Reynert Reynertson to Bernhard Magnuson: Springfield and Belden Avenues.
Reynert Reynertson to Karl H. Olsen: Springfield and Belden Avenue. Price, $3,500.
Henry C. King to Henry F. Swanson: Flournoy Street and Central Park Avenue. Price, $950.
Charles H. Reynolds to Harry J. Johnson: Morton Street and Phillips Avenue. Price, $1.
Louis M. Nelson to Nicolas Zepp: Bernice and 52nd Avenues. Price, $2,400.
Lina M. Sandahl to Louis M. Nelson: Dakin Street and 52nd Avenue. Price, $1.
Geo. J. Johnson to Sam Arado: Grand and 48th Avenues. Price, $2,700.
Mathilde Davidson to Peter O. Lind: Carmen and Ashland Avenues. Price, $7,500.
George K. Spoor to Johanna M. Nelson: Margate Terrace and Sheridan Road. Price, $5,400.
G. H. Spoor to Axel E. Olesen: Margate Terrace and Sheridan Road. Price, $5,400.
N. W. T. Christensen to L. M. Weaver: Paulina and Byron Streets. Price, $2,200.
Lena H. Petersen to M. Gratch: Artesian and Montrose Avenues. Price, $7,300.
Adolph Schmidt to Annie C. Hattstrom: Christiana Avenue and Byron Street. Price, $2,200.
Theodor Voss to Henry S. Bauer: Eberly and Sunnyside Avenues. Price, $4,000.
Sofig Gustafson to Adelof J. Nelson: Fullerton and Lowell Avenues. Price, $6,500.
Mathilde Davidson to Peter E. Lind: Monticello and Leland Avenues. Price, $1,155.
Ira M. Cobe to Nels N. Johnson: Ridgeway Avenue and Grace Street. Price, $1,600.
Adelof J. Nelson to Sofie Gustafson: Tripp and North Avenues. Price, $900.
A.A. Rogalla to Kristian A. Jacobsen: Frances Place and Point Street. Price, $3,100.
William O. Larsen to Ditlef Holmeide: Edgewood and Sacramento Avenues. Price, $1,650.
Jens J. Nielsen to Lonneth Nielsen: Johnston and Sacramento Avenues. Price, $1,900.
Ira M. Cobe to Rasmus Jensen: Whipple Street and Bloomingdale Avenue. Price, $2,450.
Sofie E. Anderson to Joseph A. Klein: Hoyne Avenue and Berlin Street. Price, $1,000.
Gustav A. Gunderson to W. Goelinowski: 2117 Thomas Street. Price, $3,000.
John Nelson to Louis Carlson: Beach and Spaulding Avenues. Price, $2,200.

Olga Carlson to Sofie Gustafson: Christiana Avenue and Division Street. Price,
$7.50.
J. Winterbottom to Aneus Sorenson: 40th Place and Potomac Avenue. Price, $6,500.
